column4: I have an MPEG-1 stream in a RIFF file (from a VideoCD) - anyone know how I could re-wrap the stream in an MPEG container, without transcoding the stream?
sure, that should be easy with ffmpeg or mencoder. Just a sec...
ffmpeg -i riff_file -vcodec copy -acodec copy mpegfile.mpg should do the trick.
whoa, I wasn't expecting the actual command :D thanks
